landing.heroDesc: Establish your vision and transform it into reality with our modern banking platform.
landing.featuresHeading: A new way to manage your everyday
landing.featuresDesc: Enjoy simplified banking from instant transfers to automated savings.
landing.feat1Desc: Your funds are protected with end-to-end encryption.
landing.feat2Desc: Our experts are available around the clock.
landing.loansHeading: Get a fast loan in clicks
landing.loansDesc: Get the best market rates in an instant.
landing.whyUsDesc: All the essential tools of a modern bank.
landing.downloadDesc: Discover the freedom of having your bank right at your fingertips with our complete mobile app.
landing.testimonialsDesc: Discover our real global impact on users.
landing.subscribeDesc: Join our mailing list to receive the latest updates, news, and exclusive offers.
landing.featCard1Desc: Send and receive money anytime without delay.
landing.featCard3Desc: Need quick funds? We unlock funds instantly.
landing.realTimeDesc: Free yourself from traditional banking boundaries.
landing.downloadAppDesc: Total banking control right in your pocket.
landing.faq2_a: Manage your accounts digitally from anywhere.
landing.faq3_a: It can be easily updated in your account settings.
landing.faq4_q: Is the app free to use?
landing.faq4_a: Yes, available on iOS and Android.
landing.rev3_text: Never felt an app this premium.
landing.footerDesc: The platform of your financial future.

about.title: Redefining Modern Banking for you.
about.desc: At Financer, we believe a bank should be transparent, accessible, and centered around your real needs to help you reach financial freedom.
about.val1Desc: No hidden fees, no bad surprises. Clear and fair pricing at all times.
about.val2Desc: Your money and data are protected thanks to our end-to-end encryption and strict protocols.
about.val3Desc: Manage your finances from anywhere in the world, at any time, via a high-performance platform.

servicesPage.title: Everything you need, gathered in one place.
servicesPage.desc: From the daily management to tracking your investments, we offer you a complete range of financial services with no compromise.
servicesPage.callToActionDesc: Join us in under 3 minutes and open your account for free with an instant IBAN and virtual cards.
servicesPage.srv1Desc: Send and receive money anywhere in the world in seconds. No hidden fees or delays, the money lands instantly in your recipient's account.
servicesPage.srv2Desc: Get free virtual or physical cards with adjustable limits. Block/unblock your card in one click from the app if lost.
servicesPage.srv3Desc: Create savings vaults with clear goals and watch your money grow thanks to our highly competitive rates calculated every week.
servicesPage.srv4Desc: We insure your funds with cutting-edge technology. Our accounts also include insurance tailored for travel and online purchases.
servicesPage.srv5Desc: Apple Pay and Google Pay integration. Pay for your in-store purchases with a simple flick of the wrist via smartphone or smartwatch.
servicesPage.srv6Desc: Get a direct line to real advisors, available 24/7 for free, without pre-recorded phone scripts.

contactPage.title: We are here to accompany you.
contactPage.desc: Forget the endless waits. Contact our trusted advisors at any time via the channel of your choice.
contactPage.callDesc: Need immediate help? Our advisors are ready to answer your call.
contactPage.whatsappDesc: Talk to us quickly via text message, wherever you are.
contactPage.emailDesc: Ideal for any detailed request or securely sending important documents.
contactPage.hours: Our customer services are open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

loanPage.heroDesc: New car, major renovations, trip around the world… Whatever your plans, our personal loan supports you up to €75,000. Flexible and transparent, it adapts to your desires. Simply!
loanPage.loanTypesDesc: A solution tailored to each situation and each project.
loanPage.personalLoanDesc: Fund your projects (wedding, travel...) without having to justify the use of funds.
loanPage.autoLoanDesc: Buy your new or used vehicle with peace of mind.
loanPage.renovationLoanDesc: Renovate your interior or expand your home at your own pace.
loanPage.studentLoanDesc: Fund your studies, housing or computer equipment.
loanPage.revolvingCreditDesc: A reserve of money available at any time to deal with unexpected events.
loanPage.needHelpDesc: Our advisors are available to guide you towards the best offer suited to your situation.
loanPage.adv1Title: Managed in just a few clicks
loanPage.adv1Desc: You can pause your repayments when you need to. You're in charge.
loanPage.adv2Desc: It's possible! If your repayment capacity increases or decreases, adjust the duration of your personal loan.
loanPage.adv3Desc: That's it! These are the key words of our loan. You manage everything directly online and independently.
loanPage.howToDesc: Speed: The process is simplified. No need to travel, everything is done from the app.
loanPage.step1Desc: To receive payment of your loan.
loanPage.step2Desc: You generally receive an in-principle response right away.
loanPage.step3Desc: Gather the documents online (ID, supporting documents...).
loanPage.step4Desc: After acceptance, sign! Funds are released quickly.

fraudPage.heroDesc: The more banking fraud techniques are known, the more you can avoid them. Fake advisor, phishing, mirror sites... With simple details in mind, you'll be able to thwart most circulating fraud. Promise!
fraudPage.fraud1Desc: A so-called advisor alerts you about abnormal operations. To fix it, they ask you to give them information or perform an action on your account... All in a rush!
fraudPage.fraud2Desc: A fraudulent email or SMS (smishing) that will push you to carry out an operation or try to obtain your personal information. Spelling mistakes, strange URL... One reflex: ignore and delete!
fraudPage.fraud3Desc: In appearance, it's a site like any other that looks exactly like a site you know. However, its purpose is to extract money or your bank details from you.
fraudPage.fraud4Desc: The fraudster can obtain your card codes in different ways (theft, photography, site hacking, skimming...). Never let your card out of your sight during a payment.
fraudPage.reflex1Desc: By email or phone, you and you alone are the holder of your bank details.
fraudPage.reflex2Title: Always log in via the app
fraudPage.reflex2Desc: To perform an action on your account, always take the same path: your banking app.
fraudPage.reflex3Desc: To carry out a transaction, make sure the URL is preceded by https and a padlock.
fraudPage.reflex4Desc: If in doubt about a caller, hang up the phone and contact your bank yourself.
fraudPage.reflex5Desc: When it comes to banking operations, always take your time before acting. There's no rush!
fraudPage.ctaDesc: If you think you are a victim of fraud or if you have the slightest doubt about a caller, don't hesitate. Our advisors are here to help you secure your accounts.

legalPage.title: Legal Notice
legalPage.headquarters: Registered office: 123 Avenue des Champs-Élysées, 75008 Paris, France
legalPage.directorDesc: Mr. Jean Dupont, in his capacity as CEO of Financer Group SA.
legalPage.authorityDesc: Financer Group is a French-law credit institution approved and supervised by the Prudential Control and Resolution Authority (ACPR).
legalPage.authorityAddress: ACPR address: 4 Place de Budapest, CS 92459, 75436 Paris Cedex 09.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.intro: The protection of your personal data is at the heart of our concerns. This policy details how Financer Group collects, uses, protects and shares your data in connection with the use of our online services.
privacyPage.dataCollectionIntro: We collect different categories of personal data, including:
privacyPage.identityDataDesc: Last name, first name, date of birth, identity document.
privacyPage.purposeIntro: Your data is processed for the following purposes:
privacyPage.purpose1: Opening and managing your bank accounts and credits.
privacyPage.purpose2: Compliance with our legal obligations (combating money laundering and terrorist financing).
privacyPage.purpose3: Provision of the application and its associated services.
privacyPage.retentionDesc: We retain your data for the duration of your contract, then for the legal limitation or retention periods applicable under French law (e.g.: 5-year retention for transactional data and contracts for anti-money laundering purposes).
privacyPage.rightsIntro: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:
privacyPage.right2: Right to erasure of your data (right to be forgotten).
privacyPage.right4: Right to object to processing for legitimate reasons.
privacyPage.rightsContact: To exercise these rights, you can contact our Data Protection Officer (DPO) at:

termsPage.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
termsPage.intro: These Terms and Conditions of Use (TCU) determine the rules of access and use of the Financer Group website. Any access or use of the site constitutes unreserved acceptance of these conditions.
termsPage.article1Desc: The site is freely accessible from any location to any user with Internet access. All costs incurred by the user to access the service (hardware, software, Internet connection, etc.) are their responsibility. The site is normally accessible 24/7. In the event of force majeure or periodic technical maintenance, access may be suspended or limited.
termsPage.article2Desc: Access to the client area requires the creation of an account where the user agrees to provide truthful, accurate and complete information. The user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their login credentials and password, as well as any action performed on their account. Any fraud or suspected fraud must be reported to us immediately.
termsPage.article3Desc: The overall structure of the site, as well as the texts, graphics, images, sounds and videos that compose it, are the property of the publisher or its partners. Any representation, reproduction, or partial or total exploitation of content and services without the prior written authorization of the publisher is strictly prohibited and may constitute infringement.
termsPage.article4Desc: The publisher disclaims any responsibility for any interruption of the site or occurrence of bugs, for any inaccuracy or omission relating to information available on the site, or more generally for any direct or indirect damage, whatever the causes or nature, caused by anyone's access to the site or the inability to access it.
termsPage.article5Desc: Hypertext links may be present on the site. The user is informed that by clicking on these links, they will leave the Financer Group site. The latter has no control over the web pages to which these links lead and cannot, in any case, be held responsible for their content.

publicFooter.description: A new way to manage your daily life and prepare for tomorrow, with complete peace of mind.
